name: Commonwealth v. Minnesota Mining and Manufacturing Company, Appellant

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The judgment of the Court below is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge Karl E. Bichards.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: John L. Connolly, with him WilUam J. Begley, and Easthurn, Begley, Mandio, Kelton & PopMn, for appellant.
Edward, Friedman, Deputy Attorney General, with him Anne X. Alpern, Attorney General, for Commonwealth, appellee.
